Package zipkin.server.brave

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApiTracerConfiguration  
    BraveConfiguration  
    CassandraTracerConfiguration
    Sets up the Cassandra tracing in Brave as an initialization.
    JDBCTracerConfiguration
    Sets up the JDBC tracing in Brave as an initialization.
    LocalSpanCollector
    A Brave SpanCollector that forwards to the local SpanStore.
    TracedSession
    Creates traced sessions, which write directly to brave's collector to preserve the correct duration.
    TracedStorageComponent  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BootstrapTrace
    This decouples bootstrap tracing from trace initialization.
